website_summaries.verdict: A nice budget-friendly option that turns eating into a puzzle for dogs, effectively slowing down fast eaters.
pros: Made from a heavy plastic that is BPA-free
Can be used with both dry and wet food
Slows the dog down and prevents bloating from eating too fast
cons: This bowl is dishwasher safe, but has so many ridges that it doesn't always come clean in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: It works but smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have an 80 pound part boxador part food vacuum mix. She went from about a minute and 30 seconds of hoovering food into her mouth hole to now about 5 or 6 minutes of frustratingly digging out every morsel. My only caution is that it barely fits one can of food so if you mix stuff with your dogs food (especially liquid) it probably will spill over either by you or by your dog trying to dig everything out. I mix a quarter cup of pumpkin into her food and that makes it just at the point of overflowing. It is not as deep as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Continuum2063

customer_reviews.title: It worked for this guy!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old pitty started to vomit up his unchewed dinner he wolfed down in what seemed like two gulps, so I got the bowl for him with what I thought was the most complicated of designs to slow him down, & he still eats super fast with it, but it at least has slowed him enough that he hasn't vomited since we started using it, so 5 stars for problem solved! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feeder for fast eater!
customer_reviews.text: We have a new puppy who she eats her food so fast that it caused her stomach problems. So I ordered this pet feeder hoping that it could slow her meal times down. And I'm happy to say, this feeder solved our problem. The feeder is very well made and does not scoot along the floor. For the price, you definitely get more than you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ferryman

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but effective
customer_reviews.text: Its smaller than I expected, but I think that’s part of the reason why it works so well. It fits 1.25 cups of kibble with room for another cup or so. It takes my pup a solid 7 minutes to finish his food. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a lifesaver this dish is!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a 10 month old rescue lab mix puppy who devours his bowl of food in about 15 seconds and then heads for our older dogs bowl which is only barely eaten. We had to separate them for meals which was a pain. Our neighbor suggested this bowl and its perfect. His kibble goes into all the little nooks and crannies and it really slows him down, which is better for his health, and our older dog has plenty of time to eat hers!
customer_reviews.author: Skerry

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is the second type of slow feeder that I have bought. This one is for my newest pup and I thought this feeder would be too easy for her, but I tried it anyways. It takes her just as much time, if not longer than my other dog to eat her food. Plus I've thrown it in the dishwasher and it comes out great, making it really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lazypuppergaming

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Torture
customer_reviews.text: All the little curls and dividers really slow down your dogs eating. I honestly think it drives the puppy crazy, but it's where her food is so she deals with it. We got this after getting a new puppy that would eat her food in just seconds and about 2 minutes later half her food would come back up. Now it takes around 2-3 minutes to heat her food and we don't have the problems urping up food anymore. It also give the older dog time to finish eating before the puppy comes to steal her meal.
customer_reviews.author: Frisco Kid

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak to durability just yet, but it seems nice enough and doesn't slip around. We currently use it for one meal a day, really it was bought as more of an entertainment/ stimulus toy for the heck of it. Our Teddy Bear is always searching for dropped bits of food and his tongue was always up to the challenge to finding random pieces of food in nooks and crannies. He also ate meals so fast I honestly don't think he chewed everything, but this has slowed him down considerably. The bonus being he doesn't act like he's starved after meals. Plus it's like a new toy that feeds him. He's happy, we're happy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to small dog, longer snout.
customer_reviews.text: I took in a small stray adolescent dog that had been starved. I mentioned to the vet that she was eating and throwing up. The vet suggested slowing her eating may help her with digestion. I purchased this bowl after reading multiple reviews and research online. What she used to eat in a minute and a half just took her 10 minutes! I'm so happy with the results. And she is challenged by the design, like a puzzle to get her last morsel. This is definitely designed for a long snout animal. It doesnt hold a lot of food, maybe a half cup but it's perfect for her size. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The puppy essential you didn’t know you needed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my puppy, who had been literally inhaling her food when I fed her from a normal bowl. I was looking for something to help slow my puppy down while she ate, so she wouldn’t have any digestive issues - and this was one of the best purchases I’ve made for my puppy so far! It’s a handy tool that you don’t think about until you have a pet that eats too quickly, but once you get it, you don’t regret it. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: the.design.jedi

customer_reviews.title: Hold really 1cup
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 yr old German Shepard because she would finish her food before my senior dog would and try to take hers. It has slowed her down to where they finish around the same time. It really only fits 1 cup of large bread dog food in it. But that doesn’t matter to me because that’s all she gets at each feeding. I’m going to buy another one for my small dog.
customer_reviews.author: james adam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, lightweight plastic
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. While it served its purpose and slowed down my dogs eating, the feet kept falling off then the dog would chew on them. The last straw was when the bowl cracked where the feet go. I literally had it for 1 week and never left it out unless the dog was eating from it. This is also quite small, 1 cup of dry food is about its max.
customer_reviews.author: AllieK

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a puppy who gobbles her food down WAY too fast, so we got this to see if it would slow her down. It works! Now it takes her 5 minutes to eat instead of 1 or less. Sometimes, she gets full and even leaves a little food at the bottom for a snack later on. Highly recommend this for a fast eater or virtual food vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O.

customer_reviews.title: Another way to keep my dog busy
customer_reviews.text: We were having troubles keeping our yellow lab quiet in the evening. He loves to bark at everything and everyone. Our dog trainer suggested we get this dog bowl to keep him busy. It works although he is a typical lab and loves his food. He has discovered that if he bites the edge, picks it up and tips it over that he can get the food faster. He is not often successful because it is hard for him to bite. Overall, we are very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Trade Wind Products

customer_reviews.title: THIS DISH WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This "slow eat" dish is absolutely heaven-sent!! I tried everything to get my newly adopted dog to slow down in her eating process, but nothing worked til I got this dish. Its amazing!! I was rather afraid she wouldnt be able to get her nose into the sections of the dish. But all has worked well, they have to use their tongue in spots but thats fine because it does skow them down alot. Its changed her behavior alot too, in that she doesnt avt like a starving little piggy anymore. It would seem she feels fuller& satisfied when she has to slow down. I HIGHLY recommend this dish. Its done wonders for my dogs eating issue!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The first one came broken. But exchanged and the second was fine. It does not hold more than 1 cup of food. So for a small dog it’s fine. For a mid sized or large breed get something else. With that being said — i also don’t feel like it slowed our dog down any. She still inhales her food within a minute or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our overweight family dog, as she tends to wolf down her food in seconds and then spend the next minute choking and coughing on it. This bowl has slowed her down a bit, enough to keep her from hacking after meals. I’m hoping it might also help with her waistline, but I’m not holding my breath. Overall, the bowl is cute, affordable, and promotes healthier, slower eating style for our dog, so I would recommend it over a plain feeding dish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works -- sort of.
customer_reviews.text: The bowl slows him down -- a little. He's still finished way too quickly. I'm not sure anything would work for him though. That dog LOVES his food. If you're looking for something that makes him eat slowly this isn't the product for you. However, if you're looking for something that keeps him from finishing his food in 3 seconds, this will work.
customer_reviews.author: Eshiqi

customer_reviews.title: Slower Eating Bowl
customer_reviews.text: For years my dog has suffered from gas. I tried to place stones in his food bowl to slow him down, but they didn't work as well as we wanted (especially after we saw on the ultrasound that his stomach was distended from abdominal gas). So we bought this food bowl, which has slowed his eating a lot and has helped with his tummy. Now, none of us suffer!
customer_reviews.author: Yaëlita

customer_reviews.title: Yes, buy it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after getting a new 10 week old puppy who had no idea about pacing herself and would inhale her food leaving her bloated and ready to vomit. Said dog is now 11 months old and has been eating out of this bowl since the day it arrived. She is a glutton, she inhales food like its her first meal ever and this bowl has made all the difference. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the zoomie eater!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had to use one of these before but I recently rescued a mini schnauzer and she ate all her food before I was back into the other room. This is a blessing in disguise! She now can eat a a slower pace and I would imagine it’s so much better on her little tummy :) It stays in place, easy to clean and so very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Nursie2335

customer_reviews.title: Needs a small improvement!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great slow feed bowl. My Australian Shepherd (3 months), barked and growled at it at first, but after a few more meals, he had the hang of it! The only problem with this bowl is the little plastic nubs on the bottom that keep it from sliding. They need to be permanently attached instead of just sliding out -- my pup had them all out and chewed up in about 30 seconds. Kind of dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Shalese

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a puppy, but as my pup gets older needing more food, I'll need to re purchase another bowl. I wish, in the description, this info of size and allotment was clearly stated. Otherwise, it has t Rubber on the bottom making it non slip which is excellent. It is sturdy and perfect for our 5 month Golden. I will need a new bowl next month
customer_reviews.author: Re

customer_reviews.title: Would have been perfect but received the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these bowls for my large puppies and I wanted another to switch up feeding time with different "puzzles" for them. Unfortunately I was sent the smaller size even though when ordering it did state I was receiving the large size. Otherwise love these bowls, slows down my speed eaters!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Great bowl, came exactly as pictured. We tried this with our year old dog since our puppy was struggling to get his food out of it because it’s a bit deep. But it did a great job as a slow feed bowl, we will move our puppy to it in about a month. Knocked off one star for not being able to use it immediately
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Slows down dog’s eating
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to try and slow down our dog’s eating to hopefully let her get fuller from her meal. The bowl slows her down for sure. She used to eat her whole bowl in 30 seconds and it now takes her about 2-3 minutes. I’m not sure if she is getting fuller but it’s definitely slowed her down which was our goal with switching bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ward

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Well, much smaller than I thought but I probably didn’t read measurements correctly. Nonetheless, it works well for our 50# mutt and her one cup of dry food in the morning and her one cup of dry food on the evening. But won’t fit much more than that. Lovely color to boot. As you can see we like our slow feeder bowls. This one fits in the family well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if your dog eats to fast.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to slow down my speed demon water. Stays put so she does not move it around the floor. There are times she actually leaves food in the bowl and finishes it later. No more vomiting because she ate to fast. Have put it through the dishwasher multiple time with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: dannie cel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for slowing down fast eaters!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for my 12 pound doxie/min pin mix. She would eat so fast sometimes she would cough and struggle a little swallowing the food. Since buying this, she still eats fast but it wont let her eat as much as quick. Its wonderful. I would recommend for any dog who eats quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Teespring

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different slow feeders to test them out and ended up repurchasing this one. I have three dogs and they fight to use this feeder. Does it slow them down? Eh, not as much as I’d like. But, they do seem to enjoy eating more and the food does make it through the day instead of being immediately devoured.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLillium

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dog that swallows his food and chokes so I bought this maze dish after talking to my vet. It really works he now has to work at his food and believe it or not he now chews the food. If you have a dog that has the same problem I highly recommend getting this bowl. ARK
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Stopped her from choking on food
customer_reviews.text: Before I started using this bowl my chihuahua gulped her food so fast she would choke at every meal. Since using this bowl she now has to work a little to get to the food and can't just gulp it all down. I would recommend cleaning it immediately or running water to let it soak or it might be a problem getting inside all the "tunnels" to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really worked
customer_reviews.text: My Pit/Lab inhaled her food something fierce. It was very ugly to watch. But this bowl forced her to eat slower. She actually eats like a lady now. No smacking, slurping, or grunts from food going down the wrong way. Simple amazing. Ty whoever designed this bowl.
customer_reviews.author: D Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good for wet or sticky foods/treats
customer_reviews.text: Works good for wet food but when I put kibble in it, my dog just flips the thing over on the floor. Haven't figured out a solution yet so I've only been using this for wet food or peanut butter. Good quality product though. Dishwasher doesn't harm it.
customer_reviews.author: Amarella

customer_reviews.title: Slowed my dog down
customer_reviews.text: We have a beagle dog who gulps his food then whines around waiting to gulp the rest of my doxie's food, too. My doxie is going to KILL him for this one and so I decided to look for a solution. Well, Voilah! Easy-peasy, does the exact trick I need it to do. Slowed my poor dumb beagle dog down in his eating to the point that sometimes my sweet killer dachshund actually finishes BEFORE him now. It's kind of cute, too, and he seems to enjoy eating now.
customer_reviews.author: WordWrangler

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my cat
customer_reviews.text: This was too deep for my cat to get any food out of it. He actually hurt himself trying to get the food out of the bottom. Would recommend only using for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Liane Seefert

customer_reviews.title: Works like it is supposed to good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for what it is supposed to do. I have a Bosten terrier, he has lot of trouble with his short snout takes a long time. He used to drink his food and now he doesn't. Have to help him when it's almost gone he get very frustrated. But the bowel does definitely slow him down
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: slow feeder
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats so fast and this new Pedy pet feeder slow feeder is great! No w he has to follow all the various channels to get at the food and it does not inhibit him from eating all of it. This product is great. Our local Humane Society is responsible for recommending this great product. Our dog Loyd loves it too...- Joe
customer_reviews.author: joe richtarcik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is so good to slow my corgi down while eating. Customer service is amazing! The bowl was chipped, and it was replaced quickly! These folks stand by their product, and I will continue do business with them. Sara is amazing as well, Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Barrett

customer_reviews.title: The best food bowl ever! 😁👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect food bowl to have. I like the color. The design is great and it really helps slow down my 5 month old puppy from gobbling up her food. It normally takes her 5 minutes to eat a cup of food. It’s also great because of the depth of the bowl. It’s easy to wash by hand and I use dish soap and it doesn't affect the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Sokoll

customer_reviews.title: Good dish
customer_reviews.text: This is a good overall product, though our puppy will out grow it eventually. We use about a 1/2 cup of food and it puts a good size layer of food in the dish. Once the dog starts eating more, and the bowl is fuller, it will be to easy for him to get the food out. Using this bowl has the dog going from being done in eating in 1 minute to taking about 5 minutes to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Gena Ann

customer_reviews.title: Happy puppy
customer_reviews.text: Having adopted a GSP I didn’t realize that dogs could inhale food at the speed of light. I knew that my regular bowl wasn’t going to cut it anymore so for her health I found this gem. She gets real serious at meal time now and takes her sweet time grabbing every last piece from this handy maze. I feel better knowing that she is feeling fuller longer with the added mind game that comes with dinner time. 100% recommend to all fast feeders
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Francis

customer_reviews.title: Too Large for my 5 Month old Chi/Jack Russell Mix
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a great bowl for my pup that wants to inhale his kibble, and it was, only one problem, his tongue is not long enough to reach the kibble. He would try and try but then look at me hungry and frustrated. I need a smaller size and something not as deep.
customer_reviews.author: not a Diva

customer_reviews.title: Happy little pup with this bowl.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my little fast eater. It slows him down and he doesnt seem to have as many problems after eating. He knows when he sees the bowl it's time to eat and gets excited. He does get a little frustrated when veggies get stuck in the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The idea of these bowls are great, and this one looked pretty, but it was too difficult for the dog. We had to purchase a different version with a more open maze. My dog was a German Shepherd puppy, and didn't do well with this one, but just fine with a similar one that is more open.
customer_reviews.author: RS5280

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected👍🏼👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great!, my dog likes it and finally she started to enjoy her food!, or at least is what I think🐶👍🏼 I even put pieces of her treats in this dish. I’m attaching a mini video as reference
customer_reviews.author: CAMILA

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was getting throwing up after eating to fast and it would continue throughout the day. This Fun little bowl worked like a charm!!!! No more upset stomach for our fast eater! It fits about 2-2 1/2 cups at a time on the size I purchased. Very affordable fix and it’s cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kwaak

customer_reviews.title: Slows down fast eating dogs!
customer_reviews.text: A great food bowl for fast eating dogs. It significantly slowed down my lab who would wolf down his food and often be sick afterwards. This forces him to slow down as he can only get a few pieces of food at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little time consuming to clean, but not difficult. Definitely slowed my dachshunds eating time down. She used to eat so fast that she would have and vomit afterwards. Now she is forced to eat more slowly and doesn't consume as much air.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Zehr

customer_reviews.title: They hated it at first because once the food gets down ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cats who have been eating way to fast and throwing up whole pieces of food. They hated it at first because once the food gets down a little lower in the bowl they had to work to get the food out. However, they have stopped throwing up after they eat and have gotten use to working for it now! I have had many friends ask about the bowl and where to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is best for little kibble like puppy food. My aussie puppy gobbles her food and this slows her down considerably. It doesn't slide around on the floor, and it is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great slow feeder for large dog
customer_reviews.text: This has helped slow my dog down so much with his eating and now he actually enjoys eating from his bowl! He gets 1.25 cups of food at a time and this is the perfect size. We love this!
customer_reviews.author: April Wright

customer_reviews.title: Works great but not for puppies
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described, definitely slow with my older Havanese dog downBut it did not work for the Havanese puppy. So now it is not long enough to get in to the nooks and crannies.
customer_reviews.author: Book Snob

customer_reviews.title: Great product for speed eaters
customer_reviews.text: Came just as described with no delays. This bowl definitely works to slow my speed eating Aussie down. I picked this design because I felt it was less likely to hurt her nose. After eating she would belch and now she doesn't. I got a smaller size and it works just fine for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jladd17

customer_reviews.title: Slow down the ferocious eater
customer_reviews.text: Labradors by nature are chow hounds. my puppy of 10 weeks ate ridiculously fast from a normal bowl. His hickup was so bad we thought he was going to vomit his food . So we tried a cupcake pan nope same issue . It wasn't until we tried the pedy pet food bowl we were able to fix the pups hickups. The bowl is thick plastic , dishwasher top rack safe and the best part is the bowl does not move when either placed on a rug or bare floor when dog is eating.
customer_reviews.author: RonVlaz

customer_reviews.title: Deep wells, hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't the right purchase for my 6 lb puppy. The wells are too deep and narrow for her snout to be able to fit, but she's too small for her tongue to reach the deepest part. However, I am giving this more stars because the actual lbowl seemed to be good quality material, and the company was amazing to work with and refunded us without any issue when we discovered it wasn't going to work for her.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Rainock

customer_reviews.title: So fun. It's pretty
customer_reviews.text: So fun. It's pretty. It lasts. My dog eats more slowly and enjoys licking every crevice after eating. It still takes our other dog three times as long to eat out of a regular bowl, but that's saying more about our slowpoke eater.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hawthorn

customer_reviews.title: This dish resolved the problem of my cat eating too quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cat food maze to slow down my cat's eating speed. This is a dog dish and rather large for a cat, but it works. Now she just picks at her kibble, eating one piece at a time.
customer_reviews.author: GottaLuvCruising

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, great product
customer_reviews.text: Decent sized bowl, plenty big for my 20# dog (3/4c food twice daily). These slow feeding dog bowls are great for slowing down oinkers & also help avoid doggie bloat (gastric dilation volvulus).
customer_reviews.author: Allyssa Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Cute & great concept but not for my little puppy.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color & great concept but I needed a slow feed for my Maltipoo puppy & this not only made her eat slow but she was not able to eat at all. She couldn’t get any food at all since it was too deep for her tongue & mouth to reach. Probably great for bigger bread puppies but not mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a chihuahua who just inhaled his food. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a chihuahua who just inhaled his food. The first time we used this bowl, he got so frustrated that he literally picked up the bowl and tried to hide it under the bed. Needless to stay, this bowl does it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: JackieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution to Guzzle Guts Pooch
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that could slow down my gluttonous Coton de Tulear. She would scarf down her food and then rush over to eat my other dog's meal. This one keeps her busy and gives my male a fighting chance for a meal of his own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely slow your pup down.
customer_reviews.text: This bowl was exactly what we were looking for. This slowed our puppy down by 3-4 minutes. Its been a life saver. I was tied of my puppy eating so quickly and then getting sick. My only complaint is that if you're food is very big or you have to give more than 2 cups, this bowl will not work. It's a little tricky not to spill the food when trying to get it in the bowl due to the design. Other than that, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slows down dog's eating.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for not giving five stars is that it is not particularly easy to clean because of the small crevices. But that is the point of the dish. It is sturdy and does stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Our wolfhound mix could inhale his food in 5 seconds before this dish. It takes him at least 5 minutes to chase every kibble out of this. Have washed in top rack of dishwasher many times and it’s holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: greys

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great for a dog who scarfs their food!
customer_reviews.text: This has been awesome for our puppy who would eat her food so fast she would have a bellyache. Perfect solution for a dog who eats too fast. Love it!!! We have a larger one for our big dog
customer_reviews.author: Mary Frances

customer_reviews.title: my dog definately eats slower with this bowl!
customer_reviews.text: My dog definitely eats slower with this bowl! I knew it would be when I purchased this, but cleaning all the little nooks is a little difficult, however it is worth it. The biggest downfall for me is that it doesn't fit inside the raised feeder I have for him. If I could put it in his feeder I would really have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Erica E Searles

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs under 20 lbs ea. Feeding them twice a day would take less than 3 min each time as it seemed they were racing to see who would finish first. But with these bowls it now can take up to 15 minutes. It is not a hectic race just quiet eating. So nice!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: great for price
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a foster dog who constantly threw up after eating too fast. this slowed him down and was a great solution. no more messes to clean! very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: allyson

customer_reviews.title: Great design, very effective
customer_reviews.text: It has been very useful in slowing down the eating of Paprika, but her sister (step) just loves to chew up plastic. She hasn't been able to chew thru it yet, but it's just a matter of time. Luckily, I ordered two by mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bowl!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to stop our 4 month old corgi from inhaling his food. Right now he eats half a cup at a time, and this bowl changed his eating time from 1 minute to 5+! It keeps him busy and slows him down. Now our other dogs can eat in peace too :)
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the results because all three of my small ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the results because all three of my small dogs have figured out they can easily turn the dish over so it is easier to clean up the food!! The small silicone "feet" come out and I almost lost two of them as they scoot away from the dish. It was worth the try but wish I had bought just one and tried it first!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Growdon

customer_reviews.title: HUGE DIFFERENCE
customer_reviews.text: MY DOGS ALWAYS SCARFED DOWN THEIR FOOD WITHOUT CHEWING IT SO I GOT THESE AND IT MAKES A WORLD OF DIFFERENCE!!! THEY CANT GET TO IT FAST SO THEY HAVE TO TAKE THEIR TIME
customer_reviews.author: Zenovia Betros

customer_reviews.title: Good Bowl
customer_reviews.text: My puppy used to gobble down her dinner like she was starved... this bowl has slowed her down a lot!! Rather than eating her food in 2 seconds it takes her a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Magess

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my pup!
customer_reviews.text: My lab mix puppy went from inhaling her food in 30 seconds to a 4-5min meal. Keep in mind when they first get it they might take longer (almost 7 mins for her), but then she "learned" it and got faster, but still keeping her eating slower so goal achieved.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: My yellow Lab would eat so fast she didn't even chew her food. This dish makes her slow down and work for the nuggets. Wish I had discovered this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog
customer_reviews.text: The areas where the food sis was too small for how deep it was. My dog was not really able to grab much. In frustration he would just tip it over.
customer_reviews.author: Yary

customer_reviews.title: If you've got a gobbler, get it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's not rocket science. It's more difficult for the dog to get to each kibble so he has to work at it. It forces him to eat more slowly. My gobbler now is the last to finish his food in comparison with his three siblings. This really is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mapache

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: The dish was too deep. My dog could barely get any food out of it....until she outsmarted it and flipped it over!
customer_reviews.author: chris lough

customer_reviews.title: I got this one for him and it is perfect, he now takes almost 5 minutes to eat ...
customer_reviews.text: Our large boxer was scarfing down his food, I saw someone post one of these bowls online and researched them. I got this one for him and it is perfect, he now takes almost 5 minutes to eat his food instead of less than a minute. I can tell a difference in his behavior after eating as well. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: brandi in louisiana

customer_reviews.title: Really slows him down
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't eat his food, he gulps it down. This dish REALLY does the trick. He takes longer to eat with this dish than any other. It is also very sturdy and well made, and my only complaint is that when he is bigger it will not hold all of his food.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Slowed my puppy down!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bowl now for a couple months and it is awesome. It's super durable. I did have to remove the little rubber non skid feet from the bottom because my puppy pulled them off any was trying to eat them. Even without the rubber feet the bowl doesn't slide on my wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to slow down my rat terrier puppy at meal time. She could eat her entire meal in 30 seconds! This dish is awesome! It now takes her about 7 minutes to finish her meal. This dish is probably best for small dogs as it doesn't hold a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy his food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog used to scarf down his food so fast that it was more like he was just inhaling it. He always ate so fast he would either get choked or have a horrible stomach ache afterwards. Now he can actually enjoy his food without the consequences of scarfing it down. It is definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Wade Lee

customer_reviews.title: Dog CANNOT eat from this
customer_reviews.text: We have another slow feeder for our other dog, and needed a new one. However this one is nice to look at but impossible for our dogs to eat from. The dish and the spirals are too deep and narrow for the dogs to get their tongues into to eat. Only buy if you have a pet giraffe or anteater. (For reference our dogs are both large breed mixes - 70lbs and 95lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cardosi

customer_reviews.title: Slowed down Terrier's meals!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old Rat Terrier who was wolfing down her food. This slowed her down considerably. It is not easy to wash by hand, but can be put in the dishwasher as needed.
customer_reviews.author: BostontoGA

customer_reviews.title: Does slow down eating
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 month old Frenchie and he is able to get all of his food out of this container even with his short/flat mouth. It has helped so much as far as slowing down his eating. He used to scarf down his food,not now. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: tamera

customer_reviews.title: made SO much difference in my puppy who had been ...
customer_reviews.text: made SO much difference in my puppy who had been a bottle baby and crazy obscessed with food! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and awesome for my dog's one cup feedings
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dogs twice a day so the feeding gets broken into one cup each time. One cup fits well in this. Definitely slows down my Pepper!
customer_reviews.author: J Books

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: It slowed my puppy down but it was really hard for her to get food out towards the end so I always have to dump the rest into a regular bowl
customer_reviews.author: K Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls
customer_reviews.text: Great bowl. Picked up 2 bowls for 2 different reasons. 1 cat ate too quickly and was getting sick, no longer an issue. Other cat is slowing down and losing weight.
customer_reviews.author: LDP

customer_reviews.title: Best dog product for fast eaters
customer_reviews.text: Best dog product for fast eaters. Have a lil chi and he inhaled his food, then ended up choking. We had to feed him a few morsels at a time. Now we can place the right amount in the slow feeder and not have to worry. It slows him way down to prevent choking. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: VANVERONA

customer_reviews.title: Tough pattern
customer_reviews.text: Very tough for her tongue to get the nuggets. I guess this pattern is the hardest , my dog actually gave up trying to eat
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for our home when her puppy visits. It does slow down her eating to match my older dogs slow approach. The color is true and it washes nicely in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Welsh

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pretty color however my puppy couldn’t abs still can’t get ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty color however my puppy couldn’t abs still can’t get a single piece of food out. The bowl is too deep I do not recommend this product for small dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Allen

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is perfect, it does exactly what it needs to. Slows my puppies feeding down so I don’t watch her belly expand and release while eating.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This product really worked good for slowing both of our dogs down. I would have rated a 5 if it had been made of metal.... our lab would eat the bowl if we left it within reach while not watching him. We joked that he did it on purpose because he didn't like having to slow down at meal times. I would highly recommend that if you have chewers, put the bowl somewhere safe when not using.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vingelen

customer_reviews.title: Really good at slowing down how fast my puppy eats his food.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this was just a gimmick, but it actually works very well in preventing my puppy from scarfing down his food in just a few seconds. The dog can easily get to all of the food, but it takes some time for him to retrieve all of it (maybe 2-3 minutes).
customer_reviews.author: JohnG

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Takes my dog approximately 30 seconds longer to scarf food from this dish rather than an open bowl. Those 30 seconds are important. Also nice it's dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. My maltese can eat (and choke) on his food in less than a minute. This has significantly slowed him down to 4 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

product_meta.title: Pedy Pet Fun Feeder Dog Bowl Slow Feeder, Slow Feed Dog Bowl, Bloat Stop Dog Bowl, Slow Feed Interactive Puzzle Non-Skid
product_meta.description:
Pedy Pet Dog Fun Slow Feeder and Bloat Stop Interactive Puzzle Non-Skid Dog Bowl 



Why You Should Choose PEDY Slow Feed Dog Bowl?
Food Grade Material
PEDY Slow Feeder Bowl is made with food safe high-strength ABS materials, BPA and PVC. 

Upgraded Design
Non-slip design prevents your dog feeding bowl from sliding and moving around

Make Every Meal Time Fun and Challenging
Interactive Slow Feeder Bowls allow your pets meal times to be much more as nature intended and interesting.

Slow Your Dogs Eating Speed
Dog Puzzle Bowl Maze is specifically designed to 10X slow down feeding speed and 10X aid digestion! What's more, your dog will not be frustrating. Help control canine obesity and calory controlled diet.

Easy To Use and Clean
To clean your slow bowl fun feeder, simply place the bowl on the top rack of your dishwasher. Your dog’s bowl will come out shining like new, preventing your pets from the yucky germs and dirt.

Product Warranty
We will provide 7/24 online Customer Service. 12 Month Warranty and 30 days full refund guarantee for purchase from FEDY.
feature_bullets: HEALTHY & FUN DIET: This slow bowl is designed to swirl flower pattern,to slow down rapid eating, stop choking, interactive and fun feeder.eat slower eat healthier
HIGH QUALITY ECO FRIENDLY: This Slow Feeder Bowl is made with FOOD SAFE, High-Strength ABS materials, and is BPA, PVC, and PHTHALATE FREE
SIZE AVALIABLE FOR ALL: Dimensions:8.1l x 7.9w x 1.4h inch.Holds up to 2 cups of dry dog food
NON-SKID: The non-skid design of the slow feeding dog food bowl at the bottom, stop the food bowl moving around, you will not see the mat or your room in a mess
WARRANTY: All products purchased from our company are guaranteed to keep in good repair for 180 days.If quality problems happen in guaranteed period, our company will maintain for free
